DOC.brief_summary: Headache after major craniotomy may be a problem in taking care of the patients. The investigators want to identify the incidence of headache after major craniotomy and also the risk factors.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Post-craniotomy Headache in Siriraj Hospital
DOC.criteria: Patient undergoing major craniotomy emergency surgery or traumatic patients may need postoperative ventilatory support more than 2 days cannot communicate psychiatric patients chronic use of benzodiazepine or drug abuse cannot follow the treatment
